location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File No. E/23 Attestation of Documents. a Powers of Attorney.'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in chronological order from the front to the rear of the file. Folio 6 consists of file notes.

The foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 7; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains a memorandum and a letter sent to the Political Agency, Bahrain, requesting an attestation of a document for the Minorsâ€™ Estates Department, Bahrain, and a landing certificate for the Customs House, Qatar.The main correspondence is between the Adviser to the Government of Bahrain (Charles Dalrymple Belgrave), Yusuf Abdulrahman Fakhroo, and the Bahrain Political Agency.

name.namePart: Adviser to the Government of Bahrain
